desc: Highest Revenue Authority. Ultimate appellate court for revenue cases. Equivalent to High Court for Revenue matters.
Head of Technical Wing. Responsible for digitization, Kanungo exams, and record modernization.
Head of Division (Mandi, Shimla, Kangra). Oversees multiple districts. First appellate authority against Collector's orders.
Head of Settlement operations in a district. Equivalent to DC but focuses only on survey and record preparation.
District Head. Appointing authority for Patwaris. Controls the District Record Room (Muhafiz Khana).
Assistant Collector 1st Grade. Has power to decide Partition (Taqseem) and Encroachment cases. Revenue Officer Class I.
Assistant Collector 2nd Grade. Attests Mutations. Can decide undisputed cases. Cannot decide contested Partitions.
Headquarters based. Maintains statistical records and salary bills of Patwaris. Custodian of Tehsil records.
Supervises ~6-7 Patwaris. Verifies 100% of mutation entries and Girdawari work on the spot.
Maintains all 23+ registers. Custodian of records at village level. Reporting officer for crop loss.
Assists the Patwari in field measurements by holding the Jarib (Chain).
Collects Land Revenue. Receives 5% 'Pachotra' (Surcharge) as fee. Reports deaths and law & order issues.
